item.title: Quirky Quakes - A tale of Earthquakes
item.description: Life in Sapporo Iâ€™ve been living in Sapporo, the capital of Hokkaido, for many years now. Hokkaido is known for its pristine forests, breathtaking natural beauty, dairy products, and fresh seafood.
